parameter.cmd: if [ ! -f /tmp/run ]; then echo 0 > /tmp/run; elif [ $(cat /tmp/run) -eq 5 ]; then echo 0 > /tmp/run; fi; RUN=$(cat /tmp/run); RUN=$((RUN+1)); echo $RUN>/tmp/run

parameter.content:
#!/bin/bash
# Provides: food
# Required-Start:
# Should-Start:
# Required-Stop:
# Should-Stop:
# Default-Start:  3 4 5
# Default-Stop:   0 6
# Short-Description: Foo Daemon
# Description: Runs foo

RUN=$(cat /tmp/run)

if [ $RUN -eq 1 ]; then
    echo -n > /tmp/food
fi

case "$1" in
    start)
        echo "start ${RUN}" >> /tmp/food
        touch /tmp/food.status
        ;;
    stop)
        echo "stop ${RUN}" >> /tmp/food
        rm -f /tmp/food.status
        ;;
    restart)
        echo "restart ${RUN}" >> /tmp/food
        ;;
    status)
        echo "status ${RUN}" >> /tmp/food
        if [ -f /tmp/food.status ]; then
            exit 0
        else
            exit 1
        fi
        ;;

    *)
        echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop|restart|status}"
        exit 1
        ;;
esac

exit 0
